gettingStartedGuide.title: Getting Started Guide
gettingStartedGuide.intro: Welcome to Rune! This guide will help you set up Rune and create your first project using its flexible and easy-to-understand format.
gettingStartedGuide.installStep1: Download Rune from the official repository.
gettingStartedGuide.installStep3: Run rune init to set up your first project.
gettingStartedGuide.firstProjectDescript: Below is an example of a simple Rune project in different formats. Use the tabs to select the format you prefer:
gettingStartedGuide.understandingBasicsD: Rune uses a structure similar to HTML for simplicity, with options to work in JSON or YAML formats as well.
gettingStartedGuide.nextStepsDescription: Explore the advanced features of Rune and join the community for support and inspiration!
